tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_sentiment_analysis (
    user_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaUsers (
    user_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    account_created_at TIMESTAMP,
    followers_count INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_created_at TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaUsers(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisResults (
    analysis_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(20),
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (analysis_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalystSentiments (
    analysis_id INT,
    analyst_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (analysis_id, analyst_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES SentimentAnalysisResults(analysis_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (analyst_id) REFERENCES PoliticalAnalysts(analyst_id)
);
